definition: to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: High home prices keep middle-income and upper-income residents here renting.
sentences.chinese: 纽约的高房价让中高收入的居民也会租房。

sentences.english: If the gamble failed, they would go back to renting.
sentences.chinese: 如果赌输了，他们会重新租房住。

sentences.english: One view states that renting a house outside campus is better.
sentences.chinese: 一种观点认为，在校园外租房子是更好的。

sentences.english: That " day hires room " how to be rented, can be you put in a few hidden trouble?
sentences.chinese: 那“日租房”如何租赁，会不会存在一些隐患呢？

sentences.english: Where husky University City rent house is cheap under Hangzhou?
sentences.chinese: 杭州下沙大学城哪里租房便宜？

sentences.english: They rent or own their own apartment or house.
sentences.chinese: 他们租房子住，或者拥有自己的公寓。

sentences.english: A: I don't remember seeing a late fee in the rental agreement.
sentences.chinese: 我不记得租房合同里提到过滞纳金。

sentences.english: Rental-market strength is also rousing a long-dormant building industry.
sentences.chinese: 租房市场的强势还唤醒了处于长期昏睡状态的建造业。

sentences.english: Students who already have on-campus housing arranged may not seek off-campus accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 已安排校内住宿者，不得私自在校外租房住宿。

sentences.english: Renting an apartment in New York is the cheapest thing ever!
sentences.chinese: 在纽约租房子是史上最便宜的事情。

sentences.english: A price-to-rent ratio of more than 20 suggests that renting may be a better deal.
sentences.chinese: 比率大于20表明租房可能是。

sentences.english: Write an ad for rent and an ad for being wanted.
sentences.chinese: 让学生写一则租房广告和求租广告。

sentences.english: Imagine a young couple now renting an apartment.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下，一对年轻夫妇现在租房住。

sentences.english: Renting is more popular than ever, even among the wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 即使是在富人圈子里，租房之风也空前盛行。

sentences.english: Remoteness of the rental date, there is looting and other possible hidden safety problems exist.
sentences.chinese: 地处偏僻的日租房，有可能存在抢劫等安全隐患。

sentences.english: Write an ad for rent or write an ad for being wanted.
sentences.chinese: 让学生写一则租房广告或求租广告。

definition: rent for a room or house
to rent jointly with other people/co-renting
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
to buy a house on a mortgage/house mortgage
